name: OBJ_WORLD
description:
OBJ_WORLD is a visual recreation & parody of EBIMAYO's "GOODWORLD" music video, created by primarily using Sequences in GameMaker Studio 2.3+. It's also a submission to YoYoGames' "GameMaker Holiday Sequences" game jam, although it doesn't really follow the theme "FORWARD MOTION". Unfortunately, I only had time to finish the first half of the project, and I'm not sure if I'll ever fully finish it.

CONTROLS:
  • ENTER - Start the movie
  • Q - Quit the movie
  • R - Restart the movie (originally used for debugging but I left it in there because why not?)
  • Page Up/Down - Change the window's resolution
CREDITS:
  • EBIMAYO
  • My PC for not burning while working on the project
POSSIBLE ISSUES:
  • The intro may or may not be desynced once the player presses ENTER the first time
  • I don't think I implemented a fullscreen mode so if you somehow switch the game to fullscreen then the resolution is 100% gonna be messed up (or not)
  • I literally cannot speak Japanese so I had to use a couple translation tools for some parts of the game
CONTACTS:

  • Email: krizisdev@gmail.com
